scripts.copy-files: copyfiles -f "build/*" "../." && copyfiles -f "build/static/css/*" "../static/css" && copyfiles -f "build/static/js/*" "../static/js/" && copyfiles -f "build/photoswipe/*" "../photoswipe/" && copyfiles -f "build/photoswipe/default-skin/*" "../photoswipe/default-skin/" && copyfiles -f "build/screenshots/sab/*" "../screenshots/sab/" && copyfiles -f "build/screenshots/ab/*" "../screenshots/ab/" && copyfiles -f "build/screenshots/sm/*" "../screenshots/sm/" && copyfiles -f "build/screenshots/growtheq/*" "../screenshots/growtheq/" && copyfiles -f "build/logos/*" "../logos/" && copyfiles -f "build/svgs/*" "../svgs/" && copyfiles -f "build/svgs/regular/*" "../svgs/regular/" && copyfiles -f "build/svgs/brands/*" "../svgs/brands/" && copyfiles -f "build/svgs/solid/*" "../svgs/solid/" && copyfiles -f "build/fontawesome/*" "../fontawesome/" && copyfiles -f "build/webfonts/*" "../webfonts/"
